channel.title: bluetooth on Documentation Spiral Code Studio
channel.description: Recent content in bluetooth on Documentation Spiral Code Studio

item.title: connect
item.description: bluetooth.connect() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.connect( params ) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call — see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. device required Device. autoConnect optional Boolean. default is false. onCharacteristicChanged optional Listener. onCharacteristicRead optional Listener. onCharacteristicWrite optional Listener. onConnectionStateChange optional Listener. onDescriptorRead optional Listener.

item.title: disconnect
item.description: bluetooth.disconnect() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.disconnect( address ) address required String.

item.title: init
item.description: bluetooth.init() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Initializes the plugin and calls the specified listener function to notify when the process is complete, or to provide error information. This call is required and must be executed before making other calls such as bluetooth.startScan(). Syntax bluetooth.init( [listener] ) listener optional Listener. Listener function which receives an init event.

item.title: isActive
item.description: bluetooth.isActive Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isMultipleAdvertisementSupported
item.description: bluetooth.isMultipleAdvertisementSupported Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isOffloadedFilteringSupported
item.description: bluetooth.isOffloadedFilteringSupported Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isOffloadedScanBatchingSupported
item.description: bluetooth.isOffloadedScanBatchingSupported Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: isScanning
item.description: bluetooth.isScanning Type Boolean See also bluetooth.* Overview

item.title: newServer
item.description: bluetooth.newServer() Type Function Return value Server See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.newServer( params ) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call — see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. onCharacteristicReadRequest optional Listener. onCharacteristicWriteRequest optional Listener. onConnectionStateChange optional Listener. onDescriptorReadRequest optional Listener. onDescriptorWriteRequest optional Listener. onExecuteWrite optional Listener. onMtuChanged optional Listener. onNotificationSent optional Listener.

item.title: setName
item.description: bluetooth.setName() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.setName( name ) name required String.

item.title: startAdvertising
item.description: bluetooth.startAdvertising() Type Function Return value Userdata See also bluetooth.* Overview Returns a Userdata representing an advertising id. Syntax bluetooth.startAdvertising( params ) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call — see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. mode optional String. "low latency", "low power", "balanced" (default). isConnectable optional Boolean. default is false. timeout optional Number.

item.title: startScan
item.description: bluetooth.startScan() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.startScan( [scanListener], [period] ) scanListener optional Listener. period optional Number. integer, default is 10000.

item.title: stopAdvertising
item.description: bluetooth.stopAdvertising() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.stopAdvertising( advertisingId ) advertisingId required Userdata.

item.title: stopScan
item.description: bluetooth.stopScan() Type Function Return value none See also bluetooth.* Overview Syntax bluetooth.stopScan()
